a root vegetable with dark skin and white flesh: Scorzonera or black salsify needs a long growing season. Scorzonera is less bitter than salsify and more highly regarded.
More examplesFewer examplesScorzonera has black or dark brown skin and looks like a cane, rather than tapering like a carrot. For this recipe, you will need two black salsify or scorzonera roots. The growing requirements for scorzonera are exactly the same as for salsify. Scorzonera is related to the radish.
